posts.question: How many of the posts do we have?
posts.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM post;

total_profiles.question: How many of the profiles do we have?
total_profiles.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS profile_count FROM profile;

linkedin_profiles.question: How many of the profiles whose network is LINKEDIN?
linkedin_profiles.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS linkedin_profile_count FROM profile WHERE network = 'LINKEDIN';

empty_name_and_url_profiles.question: How many of the profiles whose name and url is empty?
empty_name_and_url_profiles.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS empty_name_url_profiles_count FROM profile WHERE (name IS NULL OR name = '') AND (url IS NULL OR url = '');
